unnormalised: **Builder Reviews: Are You Doing Your Homework Before Buying That Dream Home?**
normalised: Builder Reviews: Are You Doing Your Homework Before Buying That Dream Home?

unnormalised: Mumbai – Buying a property is a huge deal, almost a *sanskar* in itself, right? But are we really checking out the *builders* before dropping our hard-earned Rs. lakhs on a new flat? Apparently, not enough, say property experts.
normalised: Mumbai – Buying a property is a huge deal, almost a sanskar in itself, right? But are we really checking out the builders before dropping our hard earned rupees lakhs on a new flat? Apparently, not enough, say property experts.

unnormalised: A new survey from the Indian Institute of Real Estate Studies (IIRES) reveals that only 30% of homebuyers thoroughly research builder reviews before investing. That's a shockingly low number, folks!
normalised: A new survey from the Indian Institute of Real Estate Studies (I I R E S) reveals that only thirty percent of homebuyers thoroughly research builder reviews before investing. That's a shockingly low number, folks!

unnormalised: Think about it: delays in possession, poor construction quality, and even legal hassles are common complaints. You don't want your dream 2BHK in Bandra turning into a nightmare.
normalised: Think about it: delays in possession, poor construction quality, and even legal hassles are common complaints. You don't want your dream two B H K in Bandra turning into a nightmare.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma, head of IIRES, emphasized the importance of reading reviews, checking RERA registration, and even visiting completed projects. "Don't just be swayed by glossy brochures or a smooth-talking salesperson. Dig deeper!" he advised.
normalised: Doctor Sharma, head of I I R E S, emphasized the importance of reading reviews, checking R E R A registration, and even visiting completed projects. "Don't just be swayed by glossy brochures or a smooth talking salesperson. Dig deeper!" he advised.

unnormalised: Platforms like Housing.com and Magicbricks now feature extensive builder reviews, complete with ratings and customer feedback. A little online sleuthing could save you a lot of heartache – and Rs.! Imagine losing that 1000 sq ft plot! So, next time, do your homework, folks. Your future *ghar* depends on it.
normalised: Platforms like Housing dot com and Magicbricks now feature extensive builder reviews, complete with ratings and customer feedback. A little online sleuthing could save you a lot of heartache – and rupees! Imagine losing that one thousand square foot plot! So, next time, do your homework, folks. Your future ghar depends on it.
